channel.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
channel.description:
**Passive 1:** _No allegiance_ - Death immune at night. Upon becoming king the death immunity is lost, and you start with 0 charges of guards.
**Day ability 1:** _Pro pretender_ - select a player, if they are non- unique then you will be able to use their primary ability tonight. (Unlimited uses) {3 day cool down} If you select a unique class then you will be given a message that they are unique.
**Night ability 1:** _Actor_ - (this will be replaced with an ability chosen by “pro pretender”)
**Night ability 2:** _Kinslayer_ - attack the king. (2 uses)
**Win con** - become king and survive ——————————— Here are some of the abilities you can get(also the converted classes for unseen are the same)
Butler,invoker, drunk - occu a player Cw, ritualist - swap two players Knight, merc - guard a player Noble, apostle - maid spy Observer - follow a player Phys, alch - heal a player Sheriff, pala, seeker - discover a players faction Fool - hide ability Princess, seeker - discover a players class type

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
Honestly I wouldn’t mind this, or at least an ability thief neut/evil class.

Sure pretender is like a pretender to the throne in lore, but it could still fit both ability thief and king goal.

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
It already can though.
Also we have reaper for that

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: Justforfun
item.description:
Is it possible to make pretender a king killer ?

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Given the international audience of ToL (doesn’t it have an international audience?), I think a name change would be good. I was confused at first too.

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
And why is Drunk occupying someone? His primary is a redirect

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Point being if you are going to take an ability from a class you have to do it right

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Oh and Knight’s Guard is distinct from Mercs Guards

Personally I would use Knights cold steel instead, they are both primary abilities so it’s valid

Also remember that Princess type check is different from Seekers

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Nobles primary ability is Gossip while Apostles is Mind warp

And don’t try to tell me that mind warp is useless for her. Because it isn’t

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Also the listed abilities don’t match up with the classes primary abilities

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
Google pretender theres a actual midevil time person called it the pretender is after the throne not pretend to be someone

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
pretender doesn’t mean “they pretend to be things” it means they are a pretender to the throne of adiart, IE: a claimant who isn’t the prime canddiate

Read full topic

item.title: How I vision the pretender (rework)
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
Passive 1:
No allegiance - Death immune at night. Upon becoming king the death immunity is lost, and you start with 0 charges of guards.

Day ability 1:
Pro pretender - select a player, if they are non- unique then you will be able to use their primary ability tonight. (Unlimited uses) {3 day cool down}
If you select a unique class then you will be given a message that they are unique.

Night ability 1:
Actor - (this will be replaced with an ability chosen by “pro pretender”)

Night ability 2:
Kinslayer - attack the king. (2 uses)

Win con - become king and survive
———————————
Here are some of the abilities you can get(also the converted classes for unseen are the same)

Butler,invoker, drunk - occu a player
Cw, ritualist - swap two players
Knight, merc - guard a player
Noble, apostle - maid spy
Observer - follow a player
Phys, alch - heal a player
Sheriff, pala, seeker - discover a players faction
Fool - hide ability
Princess, seeker - discover a players class type

Read full topic
